Posts.Content: Sep 15, 2010 06:58PM kezzabellecat wrote: Thankyou so much for the replies. like I said had an FNAB but the surgeon wants me to have have a core biopsy next week as he said the position the lump is in being so close to the nipple, if it is maligant he will have to do a mastectomy, he seemed pretty sure it is malignant. The lesion is not a cyst as in the FNAB the mass was solid and they had trouble getting anything out at all. I just wish he could do a lumpectomy to take the whole mass out and then at least they could test the whole thing not just a small part, the waiting is the hardest part, I feel like I am standing on then edge of a cliff. Anyway thank you to all that replied, you are my inspiration.
Posts.Title: What is debris? Why did sugeon say it looked malignent? kezzabellecat squidwitch42
